attributes.action: Make it compulsory for major supermarkets and food outlets to give homeless food that is being chucked away.
attributes.additional_details: Too much food is going to waste is Britain. With too many people sleeping rough on the streets in this so-called 'developed' country and the pains of hunger affecting at least 2,000 each night, it is time we done something as a nation. Address the issue of the homeless starving! This petition is for the UK government to make it compulsory for large supermarkets and food outlets to donate their food waste to the homeless instead of filling landfill.
